verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> in Thy strength <S%H5797><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> will be glad, <S%H8055><s%> And in Thy salvation <S%H3444><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> he will rejoice! <S%H1523><s%>
Thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> him his heart's desire, <S%H8378><s%> And Thou hast not withheld <S%H4513><s%> the request <S%H782><s%> of his lips. <S%H8193><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

For Thou dost meet <S%H6923><s%> him with the blessings <S%H1293><s%> of good <S%H9185><s%> things; <S%H9185><s%> Thou dost set <S%H7896><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of fine <S%H6337><s%> gold <S%H6337><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%>
He asked <S%H7592><s%> life <S%H9132><s%> of Thee, Thou didst give <S%H5414><s%> it to him, Length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>
His glory <S%H9202><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> through Thy salvation, <S%H3444><s%> Splendor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%> Thou dost place <S%H7737><s%> upon him.

For Thou dost make <S%H7896><s%> him most <S%H1293><s%> blessed <S%H1293><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> Thou dost make <S%H2302><s%> him joyful <S%H2302><s%> with gladness <S%H8057><s%> in Thy presence. <S%H6440><s%>

For the king <S%H4428><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And through the lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> of the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> he will not be shaken. <S%H4131><s%>

Your hand <S%H3027><s%> will find <S%H4672><s%> out all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies; <S%H340><s%> Your right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> will find <S%H4672><s%> out those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you.

You will make <S%H7896><s%> them as a fiery <S%H784><s%> oven <S%H8574><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your anger; <S%H6440><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will swallow <S%H1104><s%> them up in His wrath, <S%H639><s%> And fire <S%H784><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> them.
Their offspring <S%H6529><s%> Thou wilt destroy from the earth, <S%H6><s%> And their descendants <S%H776><s%> from among the sons <S%H2233><s%> of men. <S%H1121><s%>
Though <S%H3588><s%> they intended <S%H5186><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Thee, [And] devised <S%H2803><s%> a plot, <S%H4209><s%> They will not succeed. <S%H3201><s%>
For Thou wilt make <S%H7896><s%> them turn <S%H7896><s%> their back; <S%H7926><s%> Thou wilt aim <S%H3559><s%> with Thy bowstrings <S%H4340><s%> at their faces. <S%H6440><s%>
Be Thou exalted, <S%H7311><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> in Thy strength; <S%H5797><s%> We will sing <S%H7891><s%> and praise <S%H2167><s%> Thy power. <S%H1369><s%>
